text.autoconfig.sypwid.title: Sypwid Config Menu
text.autoconfig.sypwid.option.newHealthb: Enable or disable the new healthbar display.
text.autoconfig.sypwid.option.newArmor.@: Enable or disable the new armor display.
text.autoconfig.sypwid.option.newAir.@To: Enable or disable the new air bar display.
text.autoconfig.sypwid.option.xoffsethea: Adjust the horizontal position of the healthbar.
text.autoconfig.sypwid.option.yoffsethea: Adjust the vertical position of the healthbar.
text.autoconfig.sypwid.option.xoffsetarm: Adjust the horizontal position of the armor display.
text.autoconfig.sypwid.option.yoffsetarm: Adjust the vertical position of the armor display.
text.autoconfig.sypwid.option.xoffair.@T: Adjust the horizontal position of the air bar.
text.autoconfig.sypwid.option.yoffair.@T: Adjust the vertical position of the air bar.
text.autoconfig.sypwid.option.xoffsettex: Adjust the horizontal position of the health text.
text.autoconfig.sypwid.option.yoffsettex: Adjust the vertical position of the health text.
text.autoconfig.sypwid.option.xoffsettex: Adjust the horizontal position of the armor text.
text.autoconfig.sypwid.option.yoffsettex: Adjust the vertical position of the armor text.
text.autoconfig.sypwid.option.xoffsettex: Adjust the horizontal position of the armor toughness text.
text.autoconfig.sypwid.option.yoffsettex: Adjust the vertical position of the armor toughness text.
Prioritizes items to sort in a specific order.
Order: armor, tools, blocks, items, stackables, unstackables, search, damage, count
*search* -> sorts items based on Minecraft's default search method, which may be slower.
